summary:
## The Bourgeoisie

The bourgeoisie is a wealthy class of people who own businesses and have power. They emerged in the late Middle Ages, becoming a "middle class" between peasants and aristocrats.  They control a lot of money and resources, and often support liberal political ideas. In communist thought, the bourgeoisie own factories and businesses during industrialization and aim to keep their wealth and power.
title: Bourgeoisie
